import Logo from '../logo/logo' import select from './select.svg' import './landingPage.css' const LandingPage = () => { const isOnScreen = (el) => { var curPos = el.offset(); var curTop = curPos.top; var screenHeight = document.window.height(); return (curTop > screenHeight) ? false : true; } const clickNav = (e)=>{ document.querySelectorAll(".nav a li").forEach(el => { if (el.classList.contains('active')) el.classList.toggle('active') }) if (!e.target.classList.contains('active')) e.target.classList.toggle('active') } const counter = (e) =>{ alert('he') if(isOnScreen(e.target)){ alert('5') } } return ( <>
